## Demographics: Age

```{r}
#| output: false

# set graph constants ----
barvar <- "B01002_001"
titlebase <- "Median age"
ylab <- "Median age"
ybreaks <- seq(0, 100, 5)
data <- acs_data

```


### Washington County is older than most area counties


```{r}
#| label: plot_age_county

barline(gtype = "county", barvar, data,
         constants = constants,
         titlebase=titlebase, ylab=ylab, ybreaks=ybreaks)

```

### Cambridge village is older than nearby places

```{r}
#| label: plot_age_place

barline(gtype = "place", barvar, data,
         constants = constants,
         titlebase=titlebase, ylab=ylab, ybreaks=ybreaks)

```

::: {style="font-size: 0.4em;"}
Caveat: Perhaps this reflects a concentration of senior housing?
:::


### Jackson and White Creek towns are older than nearby towns

```{r}
#| label: plot_age_cousub

barline(gtype = "cousub", barvar, data,
         constants = constants,
         titlebase=titlebase, ylab=ylab, ybreaks=ybreaks)

```
